sn35.60:0.3: The Complete Understanding of All Grasping
sn35.60:1.1: “Monks, I will teach you the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping.
sn35.60:1.3: And what is the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping?
sn35.60:1.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the seer and the seen. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.60:1.5: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.60:1.6: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the seer, the seen, eye consciousness, eye contact, and feeling.
sn35.60:1.7: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely understood grasping.’
sn35.60:1.8: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the hearer and the heard. …
sn35.60:1.9: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the smeller and the smelled. …
sn35.60:1.10: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the taster and the tasted. …
sn35.60:1.11: Body consciousness arises dependent on the toucher and the touchedes. …
sn35.60:1.12: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the thinker and the thought. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.60:1.13: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.60:1.14: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the thinker, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, and feeling.
sn35.60:1.15: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely understood grasping.’
sn35.60:1.16: This is the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping.”
